I hope the meal is enjoyable for you both."/playSound woodyHit/specificTemporarySprite joshDinner/speak Nikolai "Thanks."/move Gus 4 0 2/move Gus 0 5 1 true/speak Nikolai "This looks really good.$3"/move Gus -7 0 1/speak Nikolai "...I hope you like it. Gus works really hard on his dishes.$1"/move Gus 0 6 2/speak Nikolai "I'm really glad you understand how I feel.$4#$b#I was pretty nervous to say that but I knew I'd be safe expressing that.$4"/playMusic Icicles/speak Nikolai "It's really hard for me to talk like this.$6#$b#People usually don't feel the same way.$2#$b#Or they just don't understand what I'm trying to say.$8#$b#Sometimes they even take what I say the wrong way.$6"/pause 600/speak Nikolai "When we started talking more...$6#$b#I kept telling myself it was pointless to try and talk to you.$2"/pause 800/speak Nikolai "...But my heart was telling me something else.$4"/pause 400/emote Nikolai 40/pause 600/speak Nikolai "You're a great friend, @, I hope we talk to each other for a really long time.$1"/pause 400/emote Nikolai 20/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/friendship Nikolai 65/end dialogue Nikolai "I hope we can do this again sometime.$4"/end
